translation: For, should I not ever engage myself in action, unwearied, people would in every way follow my path, O Arjuna.
commentary: 3.23 If if? Hi surely? I'm I? Not not? I should behave engage Myself in action? Jatu ever? in action in action? Lazily unwearied? My My? Current path? follow follow? Humans men? Partha O Partha? Sarvashah in every way.Commentary If I remain inactive? people will also imitate Me and keep eating. They will all become Tamasic and pass into a state of inertia.
